name: OrderCircle, Inc.
description: Operator of a B2B e-commerce platform intended to manage wholesale orders. The company's platform leverages technology to accept and manage wholesale ordering with inventory, invoices, customer management, and multi-language support, enabling companies to simplify whole order management.
